text:
Ed Sheeran Sings And Jams Candy In His Mouth For Carpool Karaoke The Shape of You singer joins James Corden for The Late Late Show's first episode in London.



Ed Sheeran brought his guitar and joined James Corden for Carpool Karaoke, which aired during The Late Late Show's first special episode in London.



The British mates sang "Shape of You," "Sing," "Thinking Out Loud," "Castle on the Hill," as well as covered Justin Bieber's "Love Yourself" and One Direction's "What Makes You Beautiful."



Ed also tried to break his personal record for stuffing 47 malted milk balls in his mouth. Did he make it? You'll have to watch the video above to find out.



Watch The Late Late Show weeknights at 12:37am/11:37pm c on CBS and stream full episodes on CBS All Access.
title: Ed Sheeran Sings And Jams Candy In His Mouth For Carpool Karaoke
